sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:modificationsToBackbone: 1. The EF1α promoter between the restriction sites MluI and BamHI in the backbone plasmid was replaced by the CBh promoter, which was PCR-amplified from the plasmid pX330-U6-Chimeric_BB-CBh-hSpCas9 (Addgene #42230). 2. The WPRE-pA between EcoRI and BstEII sites in the backbone plasmid was replaced by the CW3SL sequence, which was amplified by PCR from the plasmid pAAV-CW3SL-EGFP (Addgene #61463). 3. The mouse Cnr2 gene was PCR-amplified from the plasmid MR205238L2 (Origene) with primers containing the sequences of FLAG and P2A, and then, inserted into the NheI (BmtI) site downstream of the eGFP sequence in the control plasmid.
